name: Baby Brawler
description:
Prevent the evil cultist from brainwashing the poor children and bring them to your own cult to be indoctrina.... I mean enlightened and create the greatest army of spooky baby cultists!

Created during Create Jam Fall 2018 with the theme Spooky Baby Cultist by Team Toughfff Timez.

Programmers: Daniel Lindholm Feveile Petersen, Nicklas Olsen, Nicolai Brobak, Natalie Mark

Graphics: David Mortensen, Mikkel Laursen

Audio: Marcus Chow, Natalie Mark
